dataList.content: Rrraaaaaaah!!!
Hey, wait…!
Sinclair leapt forth to chase Kromer before anyone could stop him.
However, he’s blocked by the remaining N Corp. Inquisitors.
In response, he swings his weapon with a tremendous force I never thought he could exert, crushing the head of the one who grabbed him.
The Inquisitor collapses to the ground before even a gasp could escape their mouth.
Sinclair would normally keep to the back of our group; this was the first time I saw him charge in unprompted like that.
…What the—? The hell have you been dawdling in the back for if you could do that?

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: I remember with clarity that I had ended your lives.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: I undoubtedly witnessed torn brain tissue spill through the cracks in your skulls.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: And yet, here you heretics are, before me on your feet.
You’re not the one to complain about miraculous recoveries…
Guido examines me closely with his piercing glare.
He then slowly nods as if his observation gave him the knowledge he needed.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: You there, the one possessing the head of a heretic.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: You must be the false shepherd enticing this herd into blasphemy.
He proceeds to nudge his chin at the nailed corpses in the courtyard.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: They committed the grave sin of entering the site of hallowed rites with their unclean bodies.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Thus, they have been punished with the same penalty as heretics receive.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: They have also been subjected to the humiliation of bodily mechanical intrusions being installed against their will.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: But you are different.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: The sin of worshipping a heretic is less severe than indulging in heresy oneself.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Therefore, as long as you are willing to repent and cleanse your minds of sin…

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: We, the Hammer, are willing to demonstrate forgiveness.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: So I implore you, ye pitiable foolish sinners, led astray by temptation.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Shake off the allure of that false miracle, and kneel before me.
The confrontation came to a standstill. No one seemed willing to speak first.
<So you’ve all been under my spell or something all along? Who’d’ve thought that.>
I tried cracking a joke to lighten the mood a little, but no one laughed.
Dante… That man… He just insulted you. He doesn’t even see you as a human being.
<I mean, you guys call me clockface all the time too…>
That’s not the same at all! Besides, I’ve never used that nickname…
Ishmael grunted.
So you think throwing some fancy words around will be enough to persuade us, eh…
Listen up, Faceplate: You’re the one who needs a little shaking off. Seems to me your human brain’s just as defective.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: You were given ample opportunity.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: You are no different from those we hung and nailed after all.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: I am a Hammer.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: I am a tool for the One Who Grips, tasked with the great mission of piercing the false flesh of heretics.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: I shall bind thee to a nail, and lay thee down furthest from soil.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: For he who shan’t repent…
Oi, when are you gonna finish your stupidly long taunt?

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: …is not granted rest beneath the earth.
